content: Allows developer plugins to trigger the opening of the directional curve editor.
Improves lighting update performance on mobile devices with PowerVR GPUs.
Improves performance on some Android devices running on PowerVR GPUs.
Reduces startup time and memory usage on Windows devices.
Script Sync and Next Gen Explorer beta features interact properly. Script Sync status and actions are now available in the Next Gen Explorer.
In a group Team Create session, the owner of the place becomes the owner of any models and assets uploaded through the Avatar Setup Tool.
Adds support for built-in and custom gear accessories in the Avatar Setup previewer.
Adds a new Class.Decal.TextureContent property so that EditableImage can be used with decals.
Fixes a bug in which playback from Class.VideoFrame doesn’t work under Class.CanvasGroup.
Improves performance of reading small boxes from Terrain.
Resolves a bug in the New Type Solver Beta where string.format previously did not respect error-suppressing types like any, leading to false positive type errors.
Fixes inconsistent behavior where the Explorer behaves as if the cursor is hovering over it when you use keyboard key interactions.
Fixes an issue where switching themes throws warnings and doesn’t change class icons in the New Explorer Beta.
Fixes an issue where instances reparent at creation and cause errors in the New Explorer Beta. You no longer get errors when inserting free models.

Enables the Class.Workspace.FallHeightEnabled property to toggle the fallen height kill plane. Also fixes the kill plane logic so that models with at least one descendant fallen part or no descendant parts are deleted.
Fixes a crash when using the CSG Class.BasePart API with the solid modeling improvements beta enabled.
